SOURCE: News Online Today
TITLE: GOVERNMENT STANDS UP ANTI-TERRORIST TASK FORCE
PUBLISHED: 17 December 2013
TEXT: President Kapelous office announced today the formation of a State security anti-terrorist task force.  A spokesman for the office said Considering the increased incidents of terrorist acts around the world, we felt it was time to readdress our operational readiness.  Task force members will be recruited from military and law enforcement agencies.
